error.message: Fetching deprecated class constant LOGGER_CHANNEL_NAME of class Drupal\build_hooks\DeployLogger. Deprecated in build_hooks:8.x-2.4 and is removed from build_hooks:8.x-3.0. There is no replacement, instead work with the deployment content entity. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3172327
Class Drupal\build_hooks\Event\ResponseEvent extends deprecated class Symfony\Component\EventDispatcher\Event: since Symfony 4.3, use "Symfony\Contracts\EventDispatcher\Event" instead

Call to deprecated method getBody() of class Drupal\build_hooks\BuildHookDetails. Deprecated in build_hooks:8.x-2.4 and is removed from build_hooks:8.x-3.0. The getBody() method is depcrecated. Use getOptions() method instead.

Call to deprecated method setBody() of class Drupal\build_hooks\BuildHookDetails. Deprecated in build_hooks:8.x-2.4 and is removed from build_hooks:8.x-3.0. The setBody() method is depcrecated. Use setOptions() method instead.
